About

My name is Alex Gibson and I'm a freelance front-end developer living in Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom. I build responsive interfaces for web applications and sites using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

I specialise in front-end web technologies including many of the newer HTML5 JavaScript API's. I also have a good level of experience working with mobile and tablet web browsers. I can write clean, semantic HTML & CSS, and I'm just as comfortable writing vanilla JavaScript as I am picking up a popular library.

In my spare time I help out as a co-maintainer on Mobile Boilerplate, and also write the occasional guest post for HTML5 Doctor.

For technical info on the creation of this site see humans.txt

Services

  • JavaScript web application development.
  • Front end user interface design & development.
  • Responsive web design.
  • Mobile web development.
  • JavaScript plugin development.
  • Project consultancy.

Technologies

  • HTML(5), CSS(3), JavaScript.
  • Sass/Compass, Less.
  • Backbone, Underscore.
  • jQuery, Zepto.
  • Jasmine, PhantonJS
  • Git, Subversion, Mercurial.
  • Touch events & device API's
  • PHP, MySQL

Client work

Most of my client work is carried out for software companies who need help with specific areas of front-end development work. If you have a project that requires assistance or some specialist skills, then I'd like to hear from you.
